The '''Dressing Room''' allows players to customize their characters after completing the first step of the {{Quest|Dragon Storm}}. The Dressing Room can be opened by selecting the {{Icon|customfile=Dressing Room Icon.png}} icon in the [[Character Menu]]. Once a [[Character]] has reached Level 90, the icon expands to a larger button and includes the text "Dressing Room".

==Outfits==
{{Main|Character Outfits}}
[[File:Dressing Room Outfit.png|right|thumb|Outfit Customization]]
Outfits are cosmetic costumes for the playable characters. This customization is purely aesthetic and has no impact on the gameplay.
{{Clr}}

==Wind Gliders==
{{Main|Wind Gliders}}
[[File:Dressing Room Wind Glider.png|right|thumb|Wind Glider Customization]]
This option changes the wind glider the character uses. This customization is purely aesthetic and has no impact on the gameplay.
{{Clr}}
